column4: my login screen is 150% the size of my monitor, but i can't go to 'login screen' in control centre... the window appears and disappears within half a second, but the 'loading login screen' thing stays in the taskbar for about a minute
anyone got any ideas?
anyone?
can you paste your /etc/hosts and /etc/hostname files to pastebin?
!paste
ok
why do you need those files? they have nothing to do with the login screen?
http://paste.ubuntu.com/17496/ why do you need that anyway? i can't see how hostname info could change the size of the login screen
they have something to do with why admin apps won't start up. does your update manager try to start and then stop also?
no everything works
except the login screen manager
ok sorry i misunderstood. i thought login was not starting up
no the manager in control panel for the login screen wont start up
so i cant figure out why my login screen is 150% of my monitor size
it only happened since yesterday after i restarted after some updates
resolution for everything else is normal?
yes
is this similar to your problem?      http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=803741
yes that's my exact problem
i haven't read whole thing. but maybe they found a fix
yeah i see it, thanks
